trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about a window class

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves information about a window class

target.mrk: Retrieves information about a window class

trans-unit.source: The class name. The name must be that of a preregistered class or a class registered by a previous call to the _WinAPI_RegisterClass() or _WinAPI_RegisterClassEx() function.

seg-source.mrk: The name must be that of a preregistered class or a class registered by a previous call to the _WinAPI_RegisterClass() or _WinAPI_RegisterClassEx() function.

target.mrk: The name must be that of a preregistered class or a class registered by a previous call to the _WinAPI_RegisterClass() or _WinAPI_RegisterClassEx() function.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, this parameter can be a class atom.

seg-source.mrk: Alternatively, this parameter can be a class atom.

target.mrk: Alternatively, this parameter can be a class atom.

trans-unit.source: The atom must be in the low-order word of $sClass; the high-order word must be zero.

seg-source.mrk: The atom must be in the low-order word of $sClass; the high-order word must be zero.

target.mrk: The atom must be in the low-order word of $sClass; the high-order word must be zero.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Handle to the instance of the application that created the class.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to the instance of the application that created the class.

target.mrk: Handle to the instance of the application that created the class.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve information about classes defined by the system (such as buttons or list boxes), set this parameter to 0 (Default).

seg-source.mrk: To retrieve information about classes defined by the system (such as buttons or list boxes), set this parameter to 0 (Default).

target.mrk: To retrieve information about classes defined by the system (such as buttons or list boxes), set this parameter to 0 (Default).

trans-unit.source: $tagWNDCLASSEX structure that contains the information about the class.

seg-source.mrk: $tagWNDCLASSEX structure that contains the information about the class.

target.mrk: $tagWNDCLASSEX structure that contains the information about the class.

trans-unit.source: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

seg-source.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

target.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.
